title: The Sarispa Thirteen
description: The unseen, untold story of ancient intergalactic beings on Earth. In this epic quest to take Earth's sovereignty from the clutches of The Sarispa Thirteen, the Intergalactic Federation enlists elite agents from all around the multiverse. The C.I.T. agents track the reigning order of reptilian aliens through time, space and dimensions.
author: C.R. Coen
